name: MEC Gradient Sling Pack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Your essentials are just a swing away. This sling pack organizes your daily necessities into a compact, DWR-treated package. The shoulder straps pivot to let you swing the pack from your back to your chest with ease.Made of durable 300-denier, high-tenacity polyester ripstop with a water-resistant finish.Back panel has light foam padding and air-mesh backing for breathability.Pivoting shoulder strap lets you swing the pack around to your front for easy access to the pockets.Long side zipper for easy access to the main compartment.Interior pockets and key clip keep you organized.External zippered pocket.Side water-bottle pocket has an elastic adjustment for security.Secure phone pocket on shoulder strap has stretch sides to accommodate a wide variety of devices.
